full_summary:
# Aircraft Rental for Parachutists
## Request for Proposal: W6399-18KA26/C

**Overview:**
Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
The Government of Canada seeks to establish a Supply Arrangement for the provision of aircraft rental services to support Parachutists operations.

**Objective:**
The objective of this requirement is to pre-qualify suppliers to provide air support to Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) parachute operations and training when military air resources are not available.

**Scope:**
The scope of the requirement includes the provision of aircraft rental services in various locations across Canada and the United States. The aircraft will be used for free fall or static line operations, transporting personnel and equipment.

**Regions:**
Aircraft rental services are required in the following regions:

* Atlantic Region (New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, and Newfoundland)
* Central Region (Quebec and Ontario)
* Western Region (Manitoba, Saskatchewan, Alberta, and British Columbia)
* United States (all, including Hawaii, Alaska, and all offshore U.S. territories)

**Aircraft Types:**
The following aircraft types will be required:

* 3 types of aircraft for free fall or static line operations
* Aircraft capable of transporting personnel and equipment

**Selection Criteria:**
The selection criteria for this requirement will be based on the supplier's ability to provide subsequent/follow-on contracts.

**Notice:**
The request for proposal document and all solicitation documents are available on Buyandsell.gc.ca. Interested suppliers may submit a bid electronically through the Government of Canada's electronic tendering system.

**Closing Date:**
The Government of Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The closing date for this tender is October 31, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. local time.

**Point of Contact:**
For information regarding this request for proposal, please contact:

* Herb Choquette, Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Phone: (613) 449-8446
* Email: herb.choquette@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
